title: Bi-Weekly Gaming Discussion Thread
selftext:
What are you playing, r/India? Let us use this thread to discuss any games you're playing, have played or are going to play. (Mobile and board games included!)

What game are you looking forward to? Are you a developer? Show us your wares!

Please don't just list the names of games, make sure to write a word or two about them as well.

Check out r/IndianGaming! They are an active community and also host a few co-op sessions.

**Gaming Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Gaming+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/xagdqefyv8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=f975f1c3093a3d9598a1da39854b03d1250bd55d
comments:
Dota2 - a moba 5v5
MHW - hunting monsters
Thank you ceb for the pos 5 wr in my pubs.
Idk which server you are playing on but ive had pos5s of all kinds.. Invoker, jug ,sven, wraithking,OD pick any random hero might have had it atleast once as pos 5 xD
Destiny 2, BorderLands 3, Horizon Zero Dawn
Finished Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice recently. What a piece of glorious art that game is.
naruto shipuuden ultimate ninja storm 3 full burst

Hollow Knight

I think I'm about 50-60% through. It's a massive game, but very satisfying to play. Great mechanics and lots of cool, diverse places to explore. 

I'm looking forward to continue playing Dragon Quest 11S and Assassin's Creed 3 once I'm done with this one. 

I'm waiting for the release of Hogwarts Legacy and Starfield. I hope the former doesn't get delayed, the gameplay overview had varying levels of quality in environments, imo.
Which platform? We can probably co op borderlands if you are on PlayStation 5
Recently bought a ps5 but not able to find any good games to play. Any suggestions? (I've played all the classics already on ps4)
Returnal is supposed to be great.
I'm currently playing cyber shadow, metal gear solid 5, slay the spire and streets of rage 4
I am on PC.
Suggest me indie games which can run on onbakrd graphics please.
Play cuphead,shovel knight, enter the gungeon, the messenger, blasphemous, doki doki literature club.
Damn, i have Cuphead and shovel knight in my steam account. Need to install them asap. Thanks.
Anytime
Warthunder , Battlefield 5 , Bioshock infinite, vampires masquerade bloodhunt , Hell Let loose etc
Just a reminder. Epic sale is on and Borderlands 3 is free till Thursday.
Horizon 2 supposedly looks great on PS5. Assuming you've played Zero Dawn that is.
Doing a second playthrough of Arkham Knight. Still think the story is bad.
Vampire Survivors.
Thanks
Yeah I've finished horizon forbidden west twice (on ps4 and ps5)
Thanks, will check it out
Is PS5 easily available to buy these days or is the stock still very limited?
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 will be released on october 28
Stock is very limited still. Every month there are around 100 units that go on sale on Sony center, Vijay sales, Amazon and Flipkart websites
Hollow Knight
Especially the ending along with the background music.
Should I play the previous Bioshock entries to enjoy Infinite?
